mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Deliveries (order_id, delivery_status, latitude, longitude, delivery_date) VALUES (#{order_id}, #{delivery_status}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, d.latitude, d.longitude FROM Orders o JOIN Deliveries d ON o.order_id = d.order_id GROUP BY o.order_id, d.latitude, d.longitude;

SELECT DISTINCT d.latitude AS startLatitude, d.longitude AS startLongitude, o.latitude AS arrivalLatitude, o.longitude AS arrivalLongitude FROM Orders o JOIN Deliveries d ON o.order_id = d.order_id WHERE o.order_id = #{order_id};
SELECT d.delivery_id, d.latitude, d.longitude FROM Deliveries d JOIN Orders o ON o.order_id = d.order_id WHERE o.order_id = #{order_id};
